subSubSection.paragraph:
[
Hylaeus varians Cockerell
is a secondary junior homonym of
Prosopis varians Spinola, 1806
, which was synonymised with
Hylaeus annularis (Kirby)
. According to Article 60 of the International Code of Zoological Nomenclature the junior homonym must receive a new name if there are no other available names. The name
multifarius
was chosen because it has the same meaning as
varians
, and therefore conveys the same meaning as the original name. A.search of the recently compiled world Bee Checklist on Species 2000, confirmed
multifarius
is not a junior homonym.]
